name: bovine
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
biology
  specialized connected with animals from the cattle group: a bovine virus See also
BSE
slow or stupid in a way that a cow is thought to be: He had a gentle, slightly bovine expression.

You can also find related words, phrases, and synonyms in the topics:
Stupid and silly
an animal from the cattle group, which includes cows, buffalo, and bison: The animals in the picture are bovines and they are eating grass. a herd of horned bovines
More examplesFewer examplesThe virus can cause brain disease in humans and bovines.The county has just under 40,000 bovines, porcines and other livestock.Grass is usually important in the diet of a bovine.
